description: This table contains the various decision-related timeliness requirements for a given review category for a contact.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization request record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REVIEW_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unique ID of the review category that the decision requirements apply to.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Behavioral Commercial Urgent Concurrent


Behavioral Commercial Urgent Preservice


Behavioral Commercial Nonurgent Preservice


Behavioral Commercial Postservice


Behavioral Marketplace Urgent Concurrent


Behavioral Marketplace Urgent Preservice


Behavioral Marketplace Nonurgent Preservice


Behavioral Marketplace Postservice


Behavioral Medicare Urgent Concurrent


Behavioral Medicare Urgent Preservice


Behavioral Medicare Nonurgent Preservice


Behavioral Medicare Postservice


Behavioral Medicaid Urgent Concurrent


Behavioral Medicaid Urgent Preservice


Behavioral Medicaid Nonurgent Preservice


Behavioral Medicaid Postservice


Nonbehavioral Commercial Urgent Concurrent


Nonbehavioral Commercial Urgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Commercial Nonurgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Commercial Postservice


Nonbehavioral Marketplace Urgent Concurrent


Nonbehavioral Marketplace Urgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Marketplace Nonurgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Marketplace Postservice


Nonbehavioral Medicare Urgent Concurrent


Nonbehavioral Medicare Urgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Medicare Nonurgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Medicare Postservice


Nonbehavioral Medicaid Urgent Concurrent


Nonbehavioral Medicaid Urgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Medicaid Nonurgent Preservice


Nonbehavioral Medicaid Postservice


Medicare Advantage Standard


Medicare Advantage Expedited


Medicare Advantage Standard Part B Drugs


Medicare Advantage Expedited Part B Drugs


Minimum of Applicable Categories

columns.name: CALCULATION_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unique ID of the calculation method of the due date for this review category.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Calendar Time


Calendar Days


Business Days

columns.name: DECISION_REQ_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the start instant for authorization request timeliness as determined for this review category.

columns.name: DECISION_STANDARD_DUE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The calculated decision due date and time (UTC) of the authorization request without any extensions taken for this review category.

columns.name: DECISION_CURRENT_DUE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The current decision due date and time (UTC) of the authorization request for this review category.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_REQUEST_DUE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) by which an additional information request extension can be taken for this review category.

columns.name: ADDL_INFO_RECEIPT_DUE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) when the receipt of additional information is due. Only set if additional information was requested.
